name: Sylvans
author: Sauce God
notes:
Dis
3 carrot you dummies, it enables OTKs all day. 3 Guardioak, also. It extends plays to give you those extra mills you need to OTK. probably would cut Dwrath for peas or something. Dwrath isn’t good. Just play Econ. Maybe monster removal, but you don’t need negation in this deck.
